SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

edu.umd.cs.guitar.ripper
Class WebRipper

java.lang.Object
  edu.umd.cs.guitar.ripper.WebRipper

public class WebRipper
extends java.lang.Object

This class will extract links from a website. It will use a configuration file to determine which tags from the site it will extract. After every link has been extracted it will write and xml document that follows the GUI structure schema.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Team Web

WebRipper

public WebRipper(java.lang.String url,
                 int w,
                 int d,
                 boolean v)
This is the main constructer of WebRipper. This will init all class properties.

Parameters:
url - The url of the root website
w - The width of how many links to crawl
d - The depth of how many websites to crawl

1.0

extract

protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> extract(java.lang.String url)
